message.body: I can't thank you enough for taking such good care of me on Saturday. And thanks for talking through so much with me. I hope it didn't feel like one big therapy session. I had so much fun and lovely you much.
:) Scott, I was so happy to be with you - to do anything and to talk about anything. It really wasn't a problem in the least. I love you.
Can't wait for art making sometime soon!
